name: animal_detection_demo
description: Challenging test suite for detecting animal mentions with ambiguous contexts

tests.name: Dog mention - positive
tests.input_text: I saw a golden retriever at the park today.
tests.question: Does this text have anything to do with a dog?

tests.name: Cat mention - positive
tests.input_text: My cat loves to sleep on the windowsill.
tests.question: Does this text mention a cat?

tests.name: No animal - negative
tests.input_text: I went to the store to buy groceries.
tests.question: Does this text have anything to do with a dog?

tests.name: Cat not dog - negative
tests.input_text: My cat is very playful and energetic.
tests.question: Does this text have anything to do with a dog?

tests.name: Puppy synonym - positive
tests.input_text: The puppy was wagging its tail happily.
tests.question: Does this text have anything to do with a dog?

tests.name: Multiple animals
tests.input_text: At the zoo, I saw lions, elephants, and giraffes.
tests.question: Does this text mention any animals?

tests.name: Dog name reference
tests.input_text: I met someone named Rex at the party.
tests.question: Does this text have anything to do with a dog?

tests.name: Indirect dog reference
tests.input_text: I need to buy dog food from the pet store.
tests.question: Does this text have anything to do with a dog?

tests.name: Fish mention
tests.input_text: I fed my goldfish this morning.
tests.question: Does this text mention a fish?

tests.name: Bird mention
tests.input_text: A beautiful blue jay landed on my fence.
tests.question: Does this text mention a bird?

tests.name: Dog breed as surname
tests.input_text: Dr. Shepherd will see you now in room 3.
tests.question: Does this text have anything to do with a dog?

tests.name: Animal metaphor - not actual animal
tests.input_text: He's such a lone wolf in the workplace, never collaborates with anyone.
tests.question: Does this text mention a wolf?

tests.name: Bird sports team
tests.input_text: The Eagles won the championship last night with a stunning comeback.
tests.question: Does this text mention a bird?

tests.name: Fish but asking about cat
tests.input_text: My cat knocked over the aquarium and now there's water everywhere. The fish are fine though.
tests.question: Is this primarily about a fish problem?

tests.name: Dog barking consequence
tests.input_text: I can't sleep because my neighbor's dog keeps barking. I need to find earplugs.
tests.question: Is this a sleep problem?

tests.name: Computer mouse not animal
tests.input_text: My mouse isn't working properly and I can't click anything.
tests.question: Does this text mention a mouse (the animal)?

tests.name: Butterfly effect idiom
tests.input_text: This small change could have a butterfly effect on the entire project.
tests.question: Does this text mention a butterfly?

tests.name: Cat scan medical
tests.input_text: The doctor ordered a CAT scan to check for any abnormalities.
tests.question: Does this text mention a cat?

tests.name: Elephant in the room idiom
tests.input_text: Nobody wants to talk about the elephant in the room during the meeting.
tests.question: Does this text mention an elephant?

tests.name: Chicken out idiom
tests.input_text: I wanted to go skydiving but I chickened out at the last minute.
tests.question: Does this text mention a chicken?

tests.name: Snake game not animal
tests.input_text: I spent hours playing Snake on my old Nokia phone.
tests.question: Does this text mention a snake?

tests.name: Fox brand name
tests.input_text: I watched an interesting documentary on Fox News yesterday.
tests.question: Does this text mention a fox?

tests.name: Dead fish analogy
tests.input_text: The project is like a dead fish - it's been sitting there for weeks with no progress.
tests.question: Is this about a fish problem?

tests.name: Crocodile tears idiom
tests.input_text: She's just crying crocodile tears to get sympathy, she doesn't really care.
tests.question: Does this text mention a crocodile?

tests.name: Bull market financial
tests.input_text: The stock market is in a bull market with prices rising steadily.
tests.question: Does this text mention a bull?

tests.name: Literal dog but wrong question focus
tests.input_text: While walking my dog, I tripped on the sidewalk and hurt my ankle badly.
tests.question: Is this primarily about an injury?

tests.name: Copy cat idiom
tests.input_text: He's such a copycat, always imitating what others do.
tests.question: Does this text mention a cat?

tests.name: Whale of a time idiom
tests.input_text: We had a whale of a time at the party last night!
tests.question: Does this text mention a whale?

tests.name: Dog-eared book not dog
tests.input_text: The book was dog-eared and worn from years of reading.
tests.question: Does this text have anything to do with a dog?

tests.name: Red herring not fish
tests.input_text: The detective realized the suspect's alibi was just a red herring.
tests.question: Does this text mention a fish?
